00043 static unsigned short I;
00044 
00046 static unsigned char delay;
00047 
00049 static unsigned char sound;
00050 
00052 static unsigned char* registers;
00053 
00055 static unsigned short pc;
00056 
00058 static unsigned char sp;
00059 
00061 static unsigned short* stack;
00062 
00063 void CPUTick(int);
00064 
00065 int setupCPU() {
00066     time_t seconds;
00067     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU initialization ...");
00068 
00069     I = delay = sound = sp = 0;
00070     pc = DATA_SPACE_START;
00071 
00072     registers = (unsigned char*)calloc(MAX_REGISTERS, sizeof(unsigned char));
00073     if(registers == NULL) return 1;
00074 
00075     stack = (unsigned short*)calloc(MAX_STACK_SIZE, sizeof(unsigned short));
00076     if(stack == NULL) return 1;
00077 
00078     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU initialized.");
00079 
00080     time(&seconds);
00081     srand((unsigned int) seconds);
00082 
00083         glutTimerFunc(16, CPUTick, 0);
00084 
00085     return 0;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void cleanupCPU() {
00089     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU  cleanup.");
00090 
00091     free(registers);
00092     free(stack);
00093 }
00094 
00099 __inline__ static void opCLS() {
00100     clearScreen();
00101 }
00102 
00109 __inline__ static void opRET() {
00110     addEntry(DISASSEMBLY, "RET");
00111     pc = stack[--sp];
00112 }
00113 
00121 __inline__ static void opJP(unsigned short nnn) {
00122     pc = nnn - 2;
00123 }
00124 
00132 __inline__ static void opJP2(unsigned short nnn) {
00133     pc = nnn + registers[0] - 2;
00134 }
00135 
00143 __inline__ static void opCALL(unsigned short nnn) {
00144     stack[sp++] = pc;
00145     pc = nnn - 2;
00146 }
00147 
00155 __inline__ static void opSE(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00156     if(registers[X] == kk) pc += 2;
00157 }
00158 
00166 __inline__ static void opSE2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00167     if(registers[X] == registers[Y]) pc += 2;
00168 }
00169 
00177 __inline__ static void opSNE(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00178     if(registers[X] != kk) pc += 2;
00179 }
00187 __inline__ static void opSNE2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00188     if(registers[X] != registers[Y]) pc += 2;
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00199 __inline__ static void opMOV(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00200     registers[X] = kk;
00201 }
00202 
00210 __inline__ static void opMOV2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00211     registers[X] = registers[Y];
00212 }
00213 
00220 __inline__ static void opMOVI(unsigned short nnn) {
00221     I = nnn;
00222 }
00223 
00230 __inline__ static void opMOVFD(unsigned short X) {
00231     registers[X] = delay;
00232 }
00233 
00240 __inline__ static void opMOVD(unsigned short X) {
00241     delay = registers[X];
00242 }
00243 
00250 __inline__ static void opMOVS(unsigned short X) {
00251     sound = registers[X];
00252 }
00253 
00261 __inline__ static void opADD(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00262     registers[X] += kk;
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00274 __inline__ static void opADD2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00275     registers[0xF] = ((int)registers[X] + (int)registers[Y] > 255) ? 1 : 0;
00276     registers[X] += registers[Y];
00277 }
00278 
00287 __inline__ static void opSUB(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00288     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] > registers[Y]) ? 1 : 0;
00289     registers[X] -= registers[Y];
00290 }
00291 
00300 __inline__ static void opSUBN(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00301     registers[0xF] = (registers[Y] > registers[X]) ? 1 : 0;
00302     registers[X] = registers[Y] - registers[X];
00303 }
00304 
00313 __inline__ static void opSHR(unsigned char X) {
00314     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] % 2);
00315     registers[X] = registers[X] >> 1;
00316 }
00317 
00326 __inline__ static void opSHL(unsigned char X) {
00327     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] >= 128) ? 1 : 0;
00328     registers[X] = registers[X] << 1;
00329 }
00330 
00338 __inline__ static void opOR(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00339     registers[X] |= registers[Y];
00340 }
00341 
00342 
00350 __inline__ static void opAND(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00351     registers[X] &= registers[Y];
00352 }
00353 
00361 __inline__ static void opXOR(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00362     registers[X] ^= registers[Y];
00363 }
00364 
00372 __inline__ static void opRND(unsigned char X, unsigned short kk) {
00373     registers[X] = (unsigned char)((rand() % 254) & kk);
00374 }
00375 
00379 __inline__ static void opDRW(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y, unsigned char n) {
00380         /*    drawSprite(registers[X], registers[Y], memory + I, n); */
00381 }

00383 void CPUTick(int na) {
00384     /* handleOpCode(); */
00385         printf("CPU %d\n", na);
00386         glutTimerFunc(16, CPUTick, 0);
00387 }

00389 void handleOpCode() {
00390     unsigned short opCode;
00391     unsigned char byte1, byte2;
00392     
00393     read(pc, 2, (unsigned char*)(&opCode));
00394     byte1 = 0x01 & opCode;
00395     byte2 = 0x10 & opCode;
00396 
00397     /*
00398     if(opCode == 0x00E0) {
00399         opCLS();
00400     } else if(opCode == 0x00EE) {
00401         opRET();
00402     }
00403 
00404     else if((opCode & 0x1000) == 0x1000) {
00405         opJP(opCode & 0x0111);
00406     } else if((opCode & 0x1000) == 0x2000) {
00407         opCALL(opCode  & 0x0111);
00408     } else if((opCode & 0x1000) == 0x3000) {
00409         opSE(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0011);
00410     } else if((opCode & 0x1000) == 0x4000) {
00411         opSNE(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0011);
00412     } else if((opCode & 0x1001) == 0x5000) {
00413         opSE2(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0010);
00414     }
00415     */
00416 }
